title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Design and analyze a rocket propulsion system. Students will calculate thrust, specific impulse, and fuel consumption for a given mission profile. Include detailed engineering drawings and performance calculations.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Perform a comprehensive combustion analysis of rocket fuel mixtures. Analyze different propellant combinations and their efficiency. Submit a technical report with experimental data and theoretical calculations.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design an optimal rocket nozzle for maximum thrust efficiency. Use computational fluid dynamics principles to model flow characteristics. Present findings in a detailed engineering report with CAD models.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Multiple choice and short answer quiz covering fundamental aerodynamic principles including lift, drag, boundary layers, and compressible flow theory as applied to aerospace vehicles.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze supersonic and subsonic flow patterns around various aerospace vehicle geometries. Use wind tunnel data and computational methods to validate theoretical predictions. Include visualization of flow fields.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Study thermal effects on aerospace vehicles during atmospheric entry. Calculate heat transfer rates, thermal protection requirements, and material selection criteria for high-temperature applications.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a lightweight yet robust spacecraft structure that can withstand launch loads and space environment conditions. Perform stress analysis and material optimization. Submit structural drawings and analysis reports.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters for various space missions including transfer orbits, orbital maneuvers, and mission planning. Use numerical methods and simulation software to verify analytical solutions.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive examination covering spacecraft systems integration, mission requirements analysis, risk assessment, and project management principles in aerospace engineering projects.
